Class HuntGoalTrigger

All Implemented Interfaces:
Hook, Listener, OntologyToken, Trigger, java.io.Serializable
public class HuntGoalTrigger
extends MoveGoalTrigger
implements Trigger, Listener, java.io.Serializable

This class extends MoveGoalTrigger to hunt the given object.

pavel
